+164: cdef double ewald_real(buck, double[:,:] pos, double[:,:] vects,
static double __pyx_f_5relax_19analytic_potentials_10buckingham_6energy_ewald_real(PyObject *__pyx_v_buck, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_pos, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_vects, PyArrayObject *__pyx_v_chemical_symbols, double __pyx_v_alpha, double __pyx_v_real_cut_off, int __pyx_v_N) {
  double __pyx_v_A;
  double __pyx_v_rho;
  double __pyx_v_C;
  double __pyx_v_dist;
  double __pyx_v_ereal;
